Vinoa Advent Calendar #1

A poised, punchy Sancerre. Quite bright w kiwi fruit but no other tropical notes. Citrus carries the flavours but then it crosses over into a tart, tangy finish. Great length.

A good start. Looking forward to seeing what the rest of the month holds. Happy December everyone!!
